metadata.Title: CVE-2022-43239 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: Libde265 v1.0.8 was discovered to contain a heap-buffer-overflow vulnerability via mc_chroma<unsigned short> in motion.cc. This vulnerability allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service (DoS) via a crafted video file.

criterions.comment: libde265: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
